name: Astrobattle
description:
Astrobattle is an arcade shooter where you seize disabled ships using your ejected escape pod! With ten unique ship types to hop between, Astrobattle is good ole fast-paced retro fun!

Astrobattle is the first of our Pinecone Games a series of small games released a few times a month.

By supporting this game you are helping kick start our studio and help us produce more games.

Please consider supporting us on Patreon to get all our new releases for free. Also, join our Discord!

Thank you and enjoy!
